import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LandingPage=()=>{const[files,setFiles]=useState([]);const navigate=useNavigate();const handleUpload=async()=>{const formData=new FormData();for(const file of files){formData.append('files',file);}try{const res=await axios.post('http://localhost:8085/api/v1/revenue/upload/files',formData);console.log(res.data.message);navigate('/dashboard');// redirect to dashboard
}catch(err){console.error('Upload failed',err);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\uD83D\uDCC1 Upload your JSON files to begin"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"file",multiple:true,onChange:e=>setFiles([...e.target.files])}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleUpload,style:{marginLeft:'10px'},children:"Upload & Proceed"})]});};export default LandingPage;
